name: Comprehensive Feature Test
description: Complete test of all chat system features including text input, choices, templates, variants, multi-text, custom values, autorouting, and cross-sequence navigation

messages.text: 🧪 Welcome to the Comprehensive Feature Test! ||| This sequence will test every feature of the chat system. ||| Let's start with basic bot messages and multi-text support.
First, let's collect your name for personalization:
Please enter your name:
Hello {user.name|there}! Nice to meet you. ||| Now I'll demonstrate text templating with fallback values. ||| Your name is stored as: {user.name}
Now let's test choice functionality with custom values:
What's your experience level with chat systems?
Excellent! You selected: {user.experience_level} ||| This demonstrates custom value storage. ||| The display text was friendly, but I stored a clean value: '{user.experience_level}'
Now let's test numeric input and comparison operators:
How old are you? (This will test numeric comparisons)
You entered: {user.age} ||| Now let's test boolean choices:
Do you want to enable notifications?
Your notification preference: {user.notifications_enabled} ||| Now let's test preference storage:
What's your preferred theme?
Theme preference stored: {user.theme} ||| Now we'll test the autoroute system with multiple conditions:
ROUTE
✅ Adult Route: You're {user.age} years old (>= 18) ||| This route was chosen based on your age. ||| Let's continue with more tests...
✅ Expert Route: You're an expert user! ||| This route was chosen based on your experience level. ||| Skipping beginner explanations...
✅ Notifications Route: You enabled notifications! ||| This route was chosen based on your notification preference. ||| I'll keep you updated...
✅ Default Route: None of the conditions matched ||| This is the fallback route. ||| This ensures the conversation always continues...
Great! Now let's test cross-sequence navigation:
Where would you like to go next?
Perfect! Let's test more complex numeric comparisons:
What's your favorite number? (We'll use this for comparison tests)
Your favorite number: {user.favorite_number} ||| Now testing all comparison operators...
ROUTE
🔢 High Number Route: {user.favorite_number} > 100 ||| You like big numbers! ||| This tests the '>' operator.
🔢 Low Number Route: {user.favorite_number} < 10 ||| You prefer single digits! ||| This tests the '<' operator.
🔢 Medium-High Route: {user.favorite_number} >= 50 ||| A solid middle-high number! ||| This tests the '>=' operator.
🔢 Medium-Low Route: {user.favorite_number} <= 25 ||| A nice moderate number! ||| This tests the '<=' operator.
🔢 Special Route: The Answer! {user.favorite_number} == 42 ||| The ultimate answer to life, universe, and everything! ||| This tests the '==' operator.
🔢 Default Route: {user.favorite_number} ||| Your number didn't match any specific conditions. ||| This ensures routing always works!

🎯 Test Summary for {user.name|Guest}: ||| Experience Level: {user.experience_level} ||| Age: {user.age} ||| Notifications: {user.notifications_enabled} ||| Theme: {user.theme} ||| Favorite Number: {user.favorite_number}

✨ Comprehensive test completed! ||| We tested: Multi-text messages, Text input, Choice buttons, Custom values, Text templating, Autorouting, Numeric comparisons, Boolean storage, Cross-sequence navigation ||| All features working perfectly!
Final test - where would you like to go?
